alert.note: Alert for Dodge (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms approaching Dodge County through 745 PM CDT... At 659 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near New Richland to near Twin Lakes. Movement was northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Claremont around 730 PM CDT. Dodge Center, Hayfield and West Concord around 735 PM CDT. Mantorville around 740 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include County Roads 20 And 5, Oslo, Concord, Eden, Highway 57 And 570th Street, County Roads 6 And 15, County Roads 5 And 6, Wasioja, Highway 56 And County 6 and Graves Landing Field. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Minnesota.
